body.p:
State of I
Marion County } SS

I Dexter B Hodges being duly sworn saith that on or about the 17 day of April A D 1863, at Clarke Station in the said Conty and state aforesaid, One Esther Ritche alias Maty Clirke alias Fany Barton did there and then unlawfully, and Feloneously take steal and cary away 3 three united states Treasury notes to the value of ten dollars each and ring to the value of 5 Dolers, als 1 lot of ^to the value of 50 Dollrs^ all the Goods and Chatles of this affavidt contra to the statue in such cases made and provided and that this affadiant further belives that the said Ester Ritche alias Maty Clarke alias Fany Barton is now in Louisville Kentucy and escaped from Justice and further prays that Your Exly Gov O. P. Morton will isue his requstion upon the Gov of Knetucy to deliver to the agent you may apoint the said Esther Riche alias Maty Clarke alias Fany Barton to be returned to Justice in the County and state aforsaid all of which is true as affidavit hereof believes.
Sworn and subcribed before me this 12 day of November, A D 1863.
State of Indiana, Marion County, Sct.

I William Wallance clerk of the Marion Circuit Court do hereby Certify that Charles Fisher Esqr is an acting Justice of the peace of Marion County state of Indiana duly elected, Commissioned and qualified; that full faith and credit are due all of his official acts; and that that the within signature purporting to be his is genuine.
In witness where of I herewith set my hand and affix the seal of said Court this 12th day of November AD 1863
